resources.string: I agree to register this device for my account.
Network connection unavailable.\nPlease check that you have a data connection and try again.
Server is not responded.\nPlease try again later.
This device does not support bluetooth.\nPlease try again with another device.
This device is not registered for your account.\nDo you want to register it now?\nAfter register, you cannot take attendance until next day. Please contact your teacher if you want take attendance.
Please register device before finish creating account.
You can only miss this class 10 times
Your account has been sign in from another device. You will automatically sign out. Click here to sign in again.
